bibl.title: Aufführungsdatum und Plazierung von Sophokles' Τηρεύς. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete
ArchPF
P. Oxy. ined ***

bibl.note: P. Oxy. ined. [décrit, avec une photographie, par: Peter PARSONS, New Greek Texts from Oxyrhynchus, British Academy Review 14 (November 2009) p. 30]. A critical commentary on an unpublished Oxyrhynchus papyrus, in which an unknown author speaks about Sophocles' success with his tragedy Tereus at the date of Euripides' Medea. This gives the date of the Sophoclean Drama [431].
